# Base64 Image Test

## Test 1: Small Red Pixel (1x1)

## Test 2: Base64 with Alt Text
![This should show a red pixel](data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAADUlEQVR42mNk+M9QDwADhgGAWjR9awAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==)

## Test 3: HTML img tag with Base64
<img src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAADUlEQVR42mNk+M9QDwADhgGAWjR9awAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==" alt="HTML Red Pixel">

## Expected Result
All three images above should display as tiny red pixels (1x1 PNG).
